htmldiff

  • vendor/bundle/ruby/2.6.0/gems/diff-lcs-1.3/bin/htmldiff
  • Last modified: 2019-02-22 15:37:57 +0000

#!ruby -w

require 'diff/lcs' require 'diff/lcs/htmldiff'

begin

require 'text/format'

rescue LoadError

Diff::LCS::HTMLDiff.can_expand_tabs = false

end

if ARGV.size < 2 or ARGV.size > 3

$stderr.puts "usage: #{File.basename($0)} old new [output.html]"
$stderr.puts "       #{File.basename($0)} old new > output.html"
exit 127

end

left = IO.read(ARGV).split($/) right = IO.read(ARGV).split($/)

options = { :title => “diff #{ARGV} #{ARGV}” }

htmldiff = Diff::LCS::HTMLDiff.new(left, right, options)

if ARGV

File.open(ARGV[2], "w") do |f|
  htmldiff.options[:output] = f
  htmldiff.run
end

else

htmldiff.run

end
